title: Half-Way There

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Speed up a player's action. For the rest of the game, their action will process immediately when it is used.
- Slow down a player's action. For the rest of the game, their action will process at a random time during the day, instead of at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may only target each player once.

desc:
Post 5000
*What?! We're not there yet?! It's almost been two years!*
